web.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
web.post-deploy: npm i ; npm link sites/elab ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media ; pm2 restart 0 --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/website/current/; npm link /srv/boston-civic-media/current ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media ; pm2 restart 0 --env staging

production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
production.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/website/current/; npm link /srv/boston-civic-media/current ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-home,boston-civic-media ; pm2 restart 'server' --env production
